hero.name: Izaak
hero.bottom: And this place is all about me

about.summary: Hi! I’m Izaak, a 17 year-old fullstack enthusiast developer from the Netherlands. I aim to write software that’s easy to use and that just gets the job done. Over the years I’ve pushed the limits of what’s possible with web technologies, even going as far as Web Operating Systems. In 2024 I started working on one of my biggest projects:

history.title: My History
history.text: I’ve been interested in IT from a very young age. I started experimenting with an old Windows XP machine at the age of 6, being programming away not a year later on my first 'modern' PC which I got when I turned 7. The first languages I took a crack at were Batch and VBS, eventually tackling HTML, CSS and Javascript. Over the years I’ve tackled everything from web operating system environments to API’s and embedded applications.

skills.title: Skills I've mastered
skills.disclaimer: * Languages I'm learning but haven't mastered (yet)

projectsLink.title: Notable projects I've worked on
projectsLink.text: I've worked on a lot of projects over the years, some would say even too many. To see what projects I've created in that time, take a look at my Projects page:

projects.newNotice: I'm working on a new projects page! Have a look and let me know if you have any feedback:

gallery.name: Project Gallery
gallery.text: Welcome to my Project Gallery! I've created a lot of projects over the years, more than I can fit on this page, but these are the most notable. Click or tap on the name of a project for more information.

sacruda.description: A system to help students keep track of their school assignments.

arcos.description: The super-advanced Svelte Operating System Environment built using web technologies.

hackathon-24.description: Audience award at the Digital Proof Hackathon

canvasscript.description: A rather silly attempt at creating a programming language to manipulate a canvas.

instype.description: A Socket.IO application where everyting anyone types is immediately broadcasted to everyone else

inepta.description: An Electron OS written in JS to set an example of what's possible with the language

vtdx.description: A Typescript-only todo list and note taking application

projects.discontinuedNotice: I've pulled the plug on this project! It is no longer being maintained, but it's still a good example of what I can do.

direct.title: Message me directly
direct.text: Have a question for me? Fill out the following form and I'll get back to you as soon as I can:
direct.name: What's your name?

thankyou.title: Thank you!
thankyou.message: The email has been sent successfully! I'll get back to you as fast as I can.

failed.title: Oh no!
failed.text: Failed to send your message!$$ Please try again later.
